amendment.description: Amendment deletes language that prohibits the use of funds by the Joint Committee on Taxation to review and determine specific income tax refunds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in House Rept. 104-146, to strike the provisions of bill that prohibit the use of funds by the Joint Committee on Taxation to review and determine specific income tax refunds from the IRS in excess of $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
